original_text: But those who are considered worthy of taking part in the age to come and in the resurrection from the dead will neither marry nor be given in marriage,
korean_text: 저 세상과 및 죽은 자 가운데서 부활함을 얻기에 합당히 여김을 받은 자들은 장가 가고 시집 가는 일이 없으며

sentences.original_text: But those who are considered worthy
of taking part in the age to come
and in the resurrection from the dead
will neither marry nor be given in marriage
